Package controller

Class TimeReportController

java.lang.Object
javax.servlet.GenericServlet
javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
baseblocksystem.servletBase
controller.TimeReportController
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig
@WebServlet("/timereports")
public class TimeReportController
extends servletBase
Servlet implementation class TimeReportController A timereporting page. Handles timereporting and all that it includes.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Linus, Sebastian, Andre
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • createActivityReport

      private ActivityReport createActivityReport​(int activityTypeId, int activitySubTypeId, java.time.LocalDate date, int year, int week, int minutes, int userId, int projectId, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse resp) throws java.lang.Exception
      Creates a new Activityreport and links it to an existing Timereport for the same week. If no Timereport exists for the given week, one is created
      Parameters:
      activityTypeId - - The int value of the activity type
      activitySubTypeId - - The int value of the activity subtype
      date - - The date the activityreport was created
      year - - The year of the activity
      week - - The week of the activity
      minutes - - The amount of minutes spent on the activity
      userId - - The id of the user who creates the activityreport
      projectId - - The id of the project in which the activityreport was created.
      resp - - HttpServletResponse
      Returns:
      - The newly created activityreport
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if anything goes wrong

    • getActivityReports

      private java.lang.String getActivityReports​(int timeReportId, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req) throws java.lang.Exception
      Builds a String containing a HTML page showing all Activityreports within the specified timereport.
      Parameters:
      timeReportId - - The id of the timereport which you want to access.
      req - - HttpServletRequest
      Returns:
      A String containing HTML to show the page described above.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if anything goes wrong

    • getUserTimeReports

      private java.lang.String getUserTimeReports​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req, java.lang.Integer userId, java.lang.String status, java.lang.Integer year, java.lang.Integer week) throws java.lang.Exception
      Builds a String containing a HTML page showing all timereports for a specific user inside the selected project.
      Parameters:
      req - HttpServletRequest
      userId - the userId for which user to retrieve timereports from.
      status - the status for which to retrieve timereports from.
      year - the year for which to retrieve timereports from.
      week - the week for which to retrieve timereports from.
      Returns:
      A String containing HTML to show the page described above.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if anything goes wrong.

    • getTimereports

      private java.lang.String getTimereports​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest req, java.lang.Integer userId, java.lang.String status, java.lang.Integer year, java.lang.Integer week) throws java.lang.Exception
      Builds a String containing a HTML page showing all timereports that conform to the specified filter parameters
      Parameters:
      req - - HttpServletRequest
      userId - - The id of user (or * for all users) whos timereports you wish to see.
      status - - The status of the timereport(s) that you wish to see.
      year - - The year of the the timereport(s) that you wish to see.
      week - - The week of the timereport(s) that you wish to see.
      Returns:
      A String containing HTML to show the page described above.
      Throws:
      java.lang.Exception - if anything goes wrong.

    • sameYear

      private boolean sameYear​(TimeReport tr, java.lang.Integer year)
      Sees if the sent in TimeReport has the same year as the sent in year.
      Parameters:
      tr - - The Timereport to check the year off.
      year - - The year to check the timereport for.
      Returns:
      true if the years matches, else false.

      Parameters:

      week - - The week to check the timereport for.
      Returns:
      true if the years matches, else false.

    • getTotalTimeReportTime

      private int getTotalTimeReportTime​(TimeReport tr) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Calculates the total amount of time spent within a single timereport.
      Parameters:
      tr - - The timereport to calculate time of
      Returns:
      an int containing total time spent
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if timeReport does not exist.

      year - - The year of the reported activity
      timeReportId - - The timereport in which the activityreport will lie
